title: Ivern has given us some of the most important information in the game!!!
body:
He's Royal
http://img3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20140618120107/leagueoflegends/images/0/08/Gromp.jpg

They have better love lives than 97% of the game's player base
http://media-titanium.cursecdn.com/attachments/58/57/sr-krugs-sleeping.jpg

And this guys... Is the real evil of the world
https://i.ytimg.com/vi/Inyo4yCkqME/maxresdefault.jpg
*DEMON*

owowowowowowowoowow

What's up with the Duck?
Am I missing some sorta quote?

"I wonder what the ducks are plotting today"

**EVIL**
I fucking love it.
He's fucking awesome, I've already decided to buy his bundle when it's out

Exactly
I still demand the duckie icon. I want it Riot. WHERE IS MY DUCK ICON RIOT?
Soon...
You forgot to add "TM" in the end.
Meh
Somebody called?
Indeed.
Ducks come from the void, the truth is out! Preach it!
Heralds child confirmed
Child? Duckie is all "Herald, I am your father"
Holy shirt
3% club :^)

Same position potentially

:-D
https://67.media.tumblr.com/d1537dd8a308618501e3455b9f86beb2/tumblr_mz69pl8CMz1rqfhi2o1_400.gif

Wait... Story time?

 Alright

So last Friday I went on my grad cruise. Great time, great food, great friendship. 

ANYWAY, later in the evening me and this girl I've been interested in were alone together while the dance party was occuring (music was meh, but that's what you get from my generations tastes.) 

We were relaxing, cuddling, that sort of thing, and it was such a nice moment. So an impulse to kiss ber kicks in, my thoughts duel for a good bit and then I'm just like... FUCK IT, WE'RE DOING THIS (in my head of course)

So I kissed her, on the Lips, and told her I had feelings for her. You know what happened after... She said she was open to us trying to date and since then I've been trying to figure out a time and place to go out with her...

Yeah... Story time with Aqualious

Early Heartseeker addition
Hopefully you won't end like Mundo on HS Vayne's splash
Well on the Bus ride back she was cuddling closer than before with me, so I'm optmistic

Wanna know some piece of advice?
Take it slow.

Rush things and crash and burn

Be slow as a slug and you'll ruin it too

Have fun finding the right pace that works for both of you
Thanks... You're a Very warmhearted Metal Master
Don't mention it, I may have to go murder some kittens and bathe in the blood of virgins to stay true to my name
I don't think Kitty Darkstar would like that... Oh well
If you live near mountains, take her hiking. (ideally to a waterfall) That is where my wife said she fell in love with me. In the mountains.
I live near the moutains. Time to put this plan into motion >:)
Are they still virgins if the bleed?

Ok, my turn now!

I've actually started to meet representatives of the female gender again after 2 years. A friend of my friends. I met her twice by now, I think she may remember my name.
Nice story! If you work at it you might be a great **fiction** writer one day.
Don't be jelly or rude,  i'll have you know, my fictions can be great

I'm older than you and haven't done more than play hug a female. I'm not even gay I just have zero game.


feelsbadman
for real :O
Why would you not assume he be dating someone, he's pretty white knight, and one of his posts said he was going on a date so
Still can't get behind the idea of me being a white knight.
I can, We just spray paint that suit of yours white

Don't you bloody dare!

I like my armor like my coffee!
With one sugar and some milk!

...

Wait..

Fck!
WE NEED FANART PEOPLE, PRONTO

You fail to see through deception.

This bastard is the real enemy.

He's always watching.

The enemy is tasty
well... that's one way to solve the root of the problem.

Those are his own people *shutter*

Potatoes ain't my people
